verbs.description: Three Americans who [V: were] detained in North Korea for more than a year were greeted by President Trump beneath a giant American flag after they returned to the mainland U.S.

[ARG1: Three Americans] [R-ARG1: who] were [V: detained] [ARGM-LOC: in North Korea] [ARGM-TMP: for more than a year] were greeted by President Trump beneath a giant American flag after they returned to the mainland U.S.
Three Americans who were detained in North Korea for more than a year [V: were] greeted by President Trump beneath a giant American flag after they returned to the mainland U.S.

[ARG1: Three Americans who were detained in North Korea for more than a year] were [V: greeted] [ARG0: by President Trump] [ARGM-LOC: beneath a giant American flag] [ARGM-TMP: after they returned to the mainland U.S.]
Three Americans who were detained in North Korea for more than a year were greeted by President Trump beneath a giant American flag after [ARG1: they] [V: returned] [ARG4: to the mainland U.S.]
